USER_NOT_FOUND_ID: User id not found in request
FIRST_NUMBER_SHOULD_BE_SMALLER_THAN_SECO: The first number should not be equal or greater than the second number
TOO_MANY_ARGUMENTS: Too many arguments for the filter
TOKEN_IS_NOT_FROM_USER: Token does not belong to the user
NOT_FOUND_TAG_ANNOUNCES_IN_DB: Not found tag announcements into db
